entry.title: The 4 Date Rule
entry.content: The 4 date rule says, go on at least 4 date with a girl before you get her emotinally attached to you. Not because you want to know her better, but because you want to make sure she isn’t a psyco who would start contacting your friends/relatives/siblings for asking them to convince you OR telling them what a jerk you are, once you decide to dump her.

entry.title: The Visualizer's Curse
entry.content: According to ‘The visualizer’s curse’ theory people with stronger visualization powers tend to be more possesive toward their partners.
